pulses_in_burst.Description: Number of pulses included in a burst.

inter_pulse_interval.Description: Interval in seconds between consecutive TMS pulses.

bursts_in_train.Description: Number of bursts included in a train.

inter_burst_interval.Description: Interval in seconds between the first pulse in the intial burst and the first pulse in the subsequent burst.

trains_in_protocol.Description: Number of trains included in a protocol.

inter_train_interval.Description: Interval in seconds between the first pulse in the intial train and the first pulse in the subsequent train.
